an7.35:4.1: “Imaṃ, bhikkhave, rattiṃ aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā … pe …
an7.35:4.4: Satthugāravatā, dhammagāravatā, saṅghagāravatā, sikkhāgāravatā, samādhigāravatā, sovacassatā, kalyāṇamittatā.
an7.35:4.5: Ime kho, bhante, satta dhammā bhikkhuno aparihānāya saṃvattantī’ti.
an7.35:4.7: Idaṃ vatvā maṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tatthevantaradhāyī”ti.
an7.35:5.1: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā sāriputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an7.35:5.2: “imassa kho ahaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmi.
an7.35:5.3: Idha, bhante, bhikkhu attanā ca satthugāravo hoti, satthugāravatāya ca vaṇṇavādī.
an7.35:5.4: Ye caññe bhikkhū na satthugāravā te ca satthugāravatāya samādapeti.
an7.35:5.5: Ye caññe bhikkhū satthugāravā tesañca vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇati bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena.
an7.35:5.12: Ye caññe bhikkhū na kalyāṇamittā te ca kalyāṇamittatāya samādapeti.
an7.35:5.13: Ye caññe bhikkhū kalyāṇamittā tesañca vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇati bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālenāti.
an7.35:5.14: Imassa kho ahaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmī”ti.
an7.35:6.2: Sādhu kho tvaṃ, sāriputta, imassa mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāsi.
an7.35:6.3: Idha, sāriputta, bhikkhu attanā ca satthugāravo hoti, satthugāravatāya ca vaṇṇavādī.
an7.35:6.4: Ye caññe bhikkhū na satthugāravā te ca satthugāravatāya samādapeti.
an7.35:6.5: Ye caññe bhikkhū satthugāravā tesañca vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇati bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālena.
an7.35:6.12: Ye caññe bhikkhū na kalyāṇamittā te ca kalyāṇamittatāya samādapeti.
an7.35:6.13: Ye caññe bhikkhū kalyāṇamittā tesañca vaṇṇaṃ bhaṇati bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ kālenāti.
an7.35:6.14: Imassa kho, sāriputta, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti.
